Atran:
Ruins Ésagira? Zacem you there?
At Ruina Ésagira Ostalos Šovs little Rejndžerov. In každoj research areas have the money fighters, but bolʹšenstvo of them - neopytnye ûncy and smogut help you, if falls in misery.
VOT SAME glupcy as you, otpravlââsʹ way, and popadaût forever in nepriâtnosti. VOT am TOZÉ air way Hodil ...
Yes No will. In smysle, then I do not poranilsâ What Hodil through. Tak, koroče ... You pojdimo way?
